species.name: pansear
descriptions: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
